text: @piersmorgan Our government & their expert advisors are doing an amazing job. It’s a new virus, with so many unknowns & we are cautiously preparing for the inevitable peak. Trust the experts, we’re lucky to have them & don’t create noise to confuse & panic the public #COVIDー19 #coronavirus
